00036  * lustre/ptlrpc/llog_server.c
00037  *
00038  * remote api for llog - server side
00039  *
00040  * Author: Andreas Dilger <adilger@clusterfs.com>
00041  */
00042 
00043 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOG
00044 
00045 #include <obd_class.h>
00046 #include <lu_target.h>
00047 #include <lustre_log.h>
00048 #include <lustre_net.h>
00049 
00050 static int llog_origin_close(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_handle *lgh)
00051 {
00052         if (lgh->lgh_hdr != NULL && lgh->lgh_hdr->llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_CAT)
00053                 return llog_cat_close(env, lgh);
00054         else
00055                 return llog_close(env, lgh);
00056 }
00057 
00058 /* Only open is supported, no new llog can be created remotely */
00059 int llog_origin_handle_open(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00060 {
00061         struct obd_export       *exp = req->rq_export;
00062         struct obd_device       *obd = exp->exp_obd;
00063         struct llog_handle      *loghandle;
00064         struct llogd_body       *body;
00065         struct llog_logid       *logid = NULL;
00066         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00067         char                    *name = NULL;
00068         int                      rc;
00069 
00070         ENTRY;
00071 
00072         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00073         if (body == NULL)
00074                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00075 
00076         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
00077         if (rc)
00078                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00079 
00080         if (ostid_id(&body->lgd_logid.lgl_oi) > 0)
00081                 logid = &body->lgd_logid;
00082 
00083         if (req_capsule_field_present(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME, RCL_CLIENT)) {
00084                 name = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME);
00085                 if (name == NULL)
00086                         RETURN(-EFAULT);
00087                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: opening log %s\n", obd->obd_name, name);
00088         }
00089 
00090         if (body->lgd_ctxt_idx >= LLOG_MAX_CTXTS) {
00091                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%s: bad ctxt ID: idx=%d name=%s\n",
00092                        obd->obd_name, body->lgd_ctxt_idx, name);
00093                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00094         }
00095 
00096         ctxt = llog_get_context(obd, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00097         if (ctxt == NULL) {
00098                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%s: no ctxt. group=%p idx=%d name=%s\n",
00099                        obd->obd_name, &obd->obd_olg, body->lgd_ctxt_idx, name);
00100                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
00101         }
00102 
00103         rc = llog_open(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, ctxt, &loghandle, logid,
00104                        name, LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
00105         if (rc)
00106                 GOTO(out_ctxt, rc);
00107 
00108         body = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00109         body->lgd_logid = loghandle->lgh_id;
00110 
00111         llog_origin_close(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle);
00112         EXIT;
00113 out_ctxt:
00114         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00115         return rc;
00116 }
00117 
00118 int llog_origin_handle_destroy(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00119 {
00120         struct llogd_body       *body;
00121         struct llog_logid       *logid = NULL;
00122         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00123         int                      rc;
00124 
00125         ENTRY;
00126 
00127         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00128         if (body == NULL)
00129                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00130 
00131         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
00132         if (rc < 0)
00133                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00134 
00135         if (ostid_id(&body->lgd_logid.lgl_oi) > 0)
00136                 logid = &body->lgd_logid;
00137 
00138         if (!(body->lgd_llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_PLAIN))
00139                 CERROR("%s: wrong llog flags %x\n",
00140                        req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_name, body->lgd_llh_flags);
00141 
00142         if (body->lgd_ctxt_idx >= LLOG_MAX_CTXTS) {
00143                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%s: bad ctxt ID: idx=%d\n",
00144                        req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_name, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00145                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00146         }
00147 
00148         ctxt = llog_get_context(req->rq_export->exp_obd, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00149         if (ctxt == NULL)
00150                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
00151 
00152         rc = llog_erase(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, ctxt, logid, NULL);
00153         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00154         RETURN(rc);
00155 }
00156 
00157 int llog_origin_handle_next_block(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00158 {
00159         struct llog_handle      *loghandle;
00160         struct llogd_body       *body;
00161         struct llogd_body       *repbody;
00162         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00163         __u32                    flags;
00164         void                    *ptr;
00165         int                      rc;
00166 
00167         ENTRY;
00168 
00169         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00170         if (body == NULL)
00171                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00172 
00173         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_SERVER,
00174                              LLOG_MIN_CHUNK_SIZE);
00175         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
00176         if (rc)
00177                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00178 
00179         if (body->lgd_ctxt_idx >= LLOG_MAX_CTXTS) {
00180                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%s: bad ctxt ID: idx=%d\n",
00181                        req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_name, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00182                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00183         }
00184 
00185         ctxt = llog_get_context(req->rq_export->exp_obd, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00186         if (ctxt == NULL)
00187                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
00188 
00189         rc = llog_open(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, ctxt, &loghandle,
00190                        &body->lgd_logid, NULL, LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
00191         if (rc)
00192                 GOTO(out_ctxt, rc);
00193 
00194         flags = body->lgd_llh_flags;
00195         rc = llog_init_handle(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle, flags,
00196                               NULL);
00197         if (rc)
00198                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00199 
00200         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00201         *repbody = *body;
00202 
00203         ptr = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00204         rc = llog_next_block(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle,
00205                              &repbody->lgd_saved_index, repbody->lgd_index,
00206                              &repbody->lgd_cur_offset, ptr,
00207                              LLOG_MIN_CHUNK_SIZE);
00208         if (rc)
00209                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00210         EXIT;
00211 out_close:
00212         llog_origin_close(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle);
00213 out_ctxt:
00214         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00215         return rc;
00216 }
00217 
00218 int llog_origin_handle_prev_block(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00219 {
00220         struct llog_handle      *loghandle;
00221         struct llogd_body       *body;
00222         struct llogd_body       *repbody;
00223         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00224         __u32                    flags;
00225         void                    *ptr;
00226         int                      rc;
00227 
00228         ENTRY;
00229 
00230         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00231         if (body == NULL)
00232                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00233 
00234         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_SERVER,
00235                              LLOG_MIN_CHUNK_SIZE);
00236         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
00237         if (rc)
00238                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00239 
00240         if (body->lgd_ctxt_idx >= LLOG_MAX_CTXTS) {
00241                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%s: bad ctxt ID: idx=%d\n",
00242                        req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_name, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00243                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00244         }
00245 
00246         ctxt = llog_get_context(req->rq_export->exp_obd, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00247         if (ctxt == NULL)
00248                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
00249 
00250         rc = llog_open(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, ctxt, &loghandle,
00251                          &body->lgd_logid, NULL, LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
00252         if (rc)
00253                 GOTO(out_ctxt, rc);
00254 
00255         flags = body->lgd_llh_flags;
00256         rc = llog_init_handle(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle, flags,
00257                               NULL);
00258         if (rc)
00259                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00260 
00261         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00262         *repbody = *body;
00263 
00264         ptr = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00265         rc = llog_prev_block(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle,
00266                              body->lgd_index, ptr, LLOG_MIN_CHUNK_SIZE);
00267         if (rc)
00268                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00269 
00270         EXIT;
00271 out_close:
00272         llog_origin_close(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle);
00273 out_ctxt:
00274         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00275         return rc;
00276 }
00277 
00278 int llog_origin_handle_read_header(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00279 {
00280         struct llog_handle      *loghandle;
00281         struct llogd_body       *body;
00282         struct llog_log_hdr     *hdr;
00283         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00284         __u32                    flags;
00285         int                      rc;
00286 
00287         ENTRY;
00288 
00289         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00290         if (body == NULL)
00291                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00292 
00293         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
00294         if (rc)
00295                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00296 
00297         if (body->lgd_ctxt_idx >= LLOG_MAX_CTXTS) {
00298                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%s: bad ctxt ID: idx=%d\n",
00299                        req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_name, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00300                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00301         }
00302 
00303         ctxt = llog_get_context(req->rq_export->exp_obd, body->lgd_ctxt_idx);
00304         if (ctxt == NULL)
00305                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
00306 
00307         rc = llog_open(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, ctxt, &loghandle,
00308                        &body->lgd_logid, NULL, LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
00309         if (rc)
00310                 GOTO(out_ctxt, rc);
00311 
00312         /*
00313          * llog_init_handle() reads the llog header
00314          */
00315         flags = body->lgd_llh_flags;
00316         rc = llog_init_handle(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle, flags,
00317                               NULL);
00318         if (rc)
00319                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00320         flags = loghandle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags;
00321 
00322         hdr = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOG_LOG_HDR);
00323         *hdr = *loghandle->lgh_hdr;
00324         EXIT;
00325 out_close:
00326         llog_origin_close(req->rq_svc_thread->t_env, loghandle);
00327 out_ctxt:
00328         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00329         return rc;
00330 }
00331 
00332 int llog_origin_handle_close(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00333 {
00334         int      rc;
00335 
00336         ENTRY;
00337 
00338         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
00339         if (rc)
00340                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
00341         RETURN(0);
00342 }
